attributes.long-description:
Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds, inspired by a 2D fighting game, is a side-scrolling beat’em up, that can be played with a group of friends, or enjoyed alone. It retains the classical 8-bit style graphics for key art, but takes advantage of modern animation and particle techniques to deliver a truly unique experience. The music is nostalgic, inspired by classic video game notes, but arranged for today’s hardware.
Not only that, players can customize, and raise their characters in their own way with talent specs and special attacks. Once the characters are ready, bring them to the arena, to compete against friends, putting everything on the line!

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1-4 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2-4 Players
Network Players 2-4
4096KB Minimum
Touchscreen

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.

attributes.name: PHANTOM BREAKER: BATTLE GROUNDS
